_meta.confidence_scale: 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 is very reliable data

_matchup_explanation.advantage: Positive value means first champion has advantage
_matchup_explanation.confidence: How reliable the matchup data is based on sample size
_matchup_explanation.skill_dependency: low/medium/high - how much skill affects the matchup

azir_vs_leblanc.reason: LeBlanc pode burst Azir facilmente pre-6 e post-6
azir_vs_leblanc.tips: Azir precisa jogar safe até Zhonya, focar farm e scale

leblanc_vs_azir.reason: LeBlanc domina lane phase com burst e mobility
leblanc_vs_azir.tips: LeBlanc deve pressionar early, roamar e fechar jogo rápido

graves_vs_kindred.reason: Graves domina early jungle vs Kindred
graves_vs_kindred.tips: Graves deve invadir early e negar marks de Kindred

kindred_vs_graves.reason: Kindred vulnerable ao early game de Graves
kindred_vs_graves.tips: Kindred deve evitar Graves early, focar farm e scaling

fiora_vs_malphite.reason: Fiora true damage quebra Malphite completamente
fiora_vs_malphite.tips: Fiora pode jogar agressivo, vitals quebram armor de Malphite

malphite_vs_fiora.reason: Malphite não consegue tankar true damage de Fiora
malphite_vs_fiora.tips: Malphite deve focar teamfight, evitar split push vs Fiora

yasuo_vs_malzahar.reason: Malzahar counter perfeito: silence, suppression, voidlings
yasuo_vs_malzahar.tips: Yasuo precisa de jungle help, QSS obrigatório

malzahar_vs_yasuo.tips: Malzahar pode jogar safe e sempre ter vantagem

draven_vs_caitlyn.reason: Caitlyn range advantage neutraliza Draven aggression
draven_vs_caitlyn.tips: Draven precisa all-in com suporte, evitar poke

caitlyn_vs_draven.reason: Range advantage permite poke sem retaliation
caitlyn_vs_draven.tips: Caitlyn deve pokear e evitar all-ins de Draven

vayne_vs_caitlyn.reason: Caitlyn domina early game de Vayne completamente
vayne_vs_caitlyn.tips: Vayne deve farmar safe, wait scaling, avoid trades

caitlyn_vs_vayne.reason: Early game bully vs late game carry
caitlyn_vs_vayne.tips: Caitlyn deve pressionar early e fechar jogo antes late

jax_vs_fiora.reason: Fiora vitals ignoram Jax defenses, outscale potential
jax_vs_fiora.tips: Jax precisa evitar extended trades, focar teamfight

fiora_vs_jax.reason: Vitals e true damage quebram defenses de Jax
fiora_vs_jax.tips: Fiora pode ser agressiva, vitals são key para victory

irelia_vs_gnar.reason: Irelia gap close neutraliza Gnar kiting
irelia_vs_gnar.tips: Irelia pode all-in quando Gnar é mini, stack passive

gnar_vs_irelia.reason: Irelia mobility e sustain quebram Gnar pattern
gnar_vs_irelia.tips: Gnar deve pokear e evitar all-ins de Irelia

thresh_vs_morgana.reason: Morgana Black Shield neutraliza Thresh hooks
thresh_vs_morgana.tips: Thresh precisa forçar Black Shield cooldown primeiro

morgana_vs_thresh.reason: Black Shield é counter direto para Thresh kit
morgana_vs_thresh.tips: Morgana deve usar shield reactively, trade bindings

lucian_vs_jinx.reason: Lucian mobility e early damage dominam Jinx
lucian_vs_jinx.tips: Lucian deve all-in early, evitar late game

jinx_vs_lucian.reason: Jinx vulnerable ao burst e mobility de Lucian
jinx_vs_lucian.tips: Jinx deve farmar safe e wait power spikes

riven_vs_poppy.reason: Poppy W neutraliza Riven mobility completamente
riven_vs_poppy.tips: Riven deve evitar all-ins, wait jungle gank

poppy_vs_riven.reason: W counter direto para mobility de Riven
poppy_vs_riven.tips: Poppy pode jogar agressivo, W shutdown é key

zed_vs_lissandra.reason: Lissandra ultimate e CC neutralizam Zed completely
zed_vs_lissandra.tips: Zed precisa roamar, não pode kill Lissandra solo

lissandra_vs_zed.reason: CC e ultimate são counter perfeito para assassinos
lissandra_vs_zed.tips: Lissandra pode jogar safe e sempre counter Zed

camille_vs_jax.reason: Jax E neutraliza Camille W, late game advantage
camille_vs_jax.tips: Camille deve pressionar early, evitar late game duels

jax_vs_camille.reason: E counter para Camille, superior scaling
jax_vs_camille.tips: Jax pode survive early e dominar late game

sejuani_vs_graves.reason: Graves kiting e damage dominam tank Sejuani
sejuani_vs_graves.tips: Sejuani deve evitar duels, focar ganks e teamfight

graves_vs_sejuani.reason: Mobility e damage quebram tank jungle
graves_vs_sejuani.tips: Graves pode invadir freely e dominar jungle

leblanc_vs_galio.reason: Galio MR e taunt neutralizam LeBlanc burst
leblanc_vs_galio.tips: LeBlanc deve roamar, não pode kill Galio

galio_vs_leblanc.tips: Galio pode jogar agressivo, ultimate counter roams

tristana_vs_caitlyn.reason: Caitlyn range early domina Tristana pre-scaling
tristana_vs_caitlyn.tips: Tristana deve farmar safe até power spike

caitlyn_vs_tristana.reason: Early range advantage contra scaling ADC
caitlyn_vs_tristana.tips: Caitlyn deve pressionar early lane phase

nidalee_vs_warwick.reason: Warwick sustain e durability quebram early game de Nidalee
nidalee_vs_warwick.tips: Nidalee deve evitar Warwick, focar counter-jungle

warwick_vs_nidalee.reason: Sustain e durability dominam glass cannon jungle
warwick_vs_nidalee.tips: Warwick pode invadir e duel Nidalee safely

orianna_vs_yasuo.reason: Yasuo wind wall e mobility dificultam Orianna
orianna_vs_yasuo.tips: Orianna deve position carefully, wait teamfights

yasuo_vs_orianna.reason: Wind wall e mobility advantage em lane
yasuo_vs_orianna.tips: Yasuo pode pressionar lane com wind wall

sylas_vs_azir.reason: Azir range e soldiers dificultam Sylas engage
sylas_vs_azir.tips: Sylas deve wait opportunities, steal Azir ultimate

azir_vs_sylas.reason: Range advantage mas ultimate pode ser stolen
azir_vs_sylas.tips: Azir deve pokear safely, careful com ultimate timing
